titleStmt.title: A vvarning to the world that are groping in the dark, after sects, opinions, and notions, which are all with the Light condemned; and by the children of Light declared against. By G: Fox.
titleStmt.author: Fox, George, 1624-1691.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Giles Calvert, at the Black Spread-Eagle at the West end of Pauls.,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
